column5: deputy police commissioner of Siem Reap
column6: the collapse of a French building on Pub Street near Siem Reap’s Old Market left one dead and four injured.------The victimsaged between 16-27 were working on the building at the time. All were from Siem Reap province.------At 12:00 am
column17: the authorities attempted to  pull the five workers from under the rubble. Four were rescued andperson died because of serious injuries.------After the incident
column18: the dead worker was given to the family for a traditional funeral and four injured were taken to hospital.------The site has been named as Nak’s Restaurant
